shared.paytable_section_lines_content: Winning combination pays from left to right along an win line. The highest win per win line is paid. Malfunctions void all pays and plays. For more information, see the game rules.
shared.rules_section_game_function_desc: The table below lists the different buttons found in the game and describes their functions.
shared.rules_section_additional_information_des: The game has a system for recovering unfinished games.
The game session will be ended automatically after an inactivity period.
In the event of malfunction of the gaming hardware/software, all affected game bets and payouts are rendered void and all affected bets refunded.
shared.rules_section_return_to_player_desc_1: The theoretical return to player for this game in the main game is {rtp}%.

game.mini_paytable_scatter_text_1:
3 OR MORE SCATTERS
TRIGGER 10 FREE GAMES
WITH EXPANDING SYMBOL
game.paytable_section_free_game_content_2: 3 or more Scatters on the screen trigger 10 Free Games with Special Expanding Symbol and Extra Spins Feature. The Special Expanding Symbol can not be substituted by a Scatter symbol during Free Games.
game.paytable_section_free_game_content_3: Special Expanding Symbol is randomly selected at the start of the Free Games and after payout of regular symbols, the Special Symbol may expand to cover 3 position on the reel and pays like the regular symbol but even on non-adjacent positions and on all lines played (expanding is only triggering if enough symbols for a win are present).
game.paytable_section_no_lose_feature_content:
Additional Free Games are awarded on each play with expansion of Special Symbol.

2-3 symbols expanding combination awards +1 Free Game.

4 symbols expanding combination awards +2 Free Games.

5 symbols expanding combination awards +3 Free Games.

Extra Spins Feature is available during Free Games bonus only.
game.paytable_section_buy_feature_content: Free Games can be activated with the Buy Feature.
game.rules_section_information_content: Wins occur on the number of paylines, according to the information in the paytable and game rules. When winning on multiple paylines in a single game round, all winnings are added together. All winnings from Features (such as Free Games) and Scatters are also added to payline wins. All winning combinations are paid out at the end of a game round. Free Game features are played with the same bet settings and lines as the game round that triggered the feature – unless otherwise stated. The bet cannot be changed during a currently running game round. Please refer to the game rules for more information.
game.rules_section_game_rules_content:
Book of Nile: Lost Chapter is a 5-reel video slot game. 10 lines are activated.

The Scatter symbol acts as a Wild, and substitutes for all other symbols.

3 or more Scatter symbols trigger Free Games. An initial 10 free games are awarded.

Additional Free Games are awarded on each play with expansion of Special Symbol.

Before a free games sequence begins, an ordinary symbol is randomly chosen to act as a Special Expanding Symbol during the entire free-game sequence. After prizes for regular winning combinations have been recognized, the special symbol may expand to cover all three positions on its reel. The special symbol will expand only when additional prizes can be awarded along active paylines for winning combinations. Expanded symbols do not need to appear adjacent to each other to result in a winning combination.

3 or more Scatter symbols re-trigger Free Spins. An additional 10 free games are awarded.

In the SETTINGS window, you can specify the bet, the sound level, the turbo mode, and the coin denomination used. To start the round, click the SPIN button. When the reels stop, the symbols displayed determine your prize according to the paytable.
game.rules_section_buy_feature_desc_1: Free Games bonus can be activated with the Buy Bonus button.
game.rules_section_buy_feature_desc_2: Buy Feature costs {bonusPrice} times the respective bet.
game.rules_section_buy_feature_desc_3: When Free Games are activated with the Buy Bonus Feature, one free main game spin that is guaranteed to activate Free Games Bonus is played.
game.paytable_section_no_bonus_gamble_content:
After each bonus game player can gamble the total bonus win.
Green sectors on the wheel are winning ones and double the current total bonus win amount.
Gamble is available for wins below x500 total bet. Losing gamble results in no win and ends the bonus.
game.free_game_wheel_popup_text_3: SELECT GAMBLE TO DOUBLE YOUR WIN OR TAKE TO GET THE CURRENT PRIZE
game.free_game_wheel_popup_text_4: gambling is active for wins below x500 total bet
